name: Levers
headline: Automating collection and boosting cashflow for B2B companies
description: Levers is an accounts receivable management SaaS that helps B2B companies reduce overdue payments, accelerate cash collection, and boost cashflow. Our software integrates with your accounting system and streamlines your AR process using personalized reminders, cross-team collaboration tools, collection performance analytics, and more.

founders.name: Ammar Alkhouli, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder at Levers. Prior to that, I spent ~3 years working at a $500m VC fund in MENA. As one of the first hires, I wore many hats beyond investment and portfolio work including strategy, compliance, financial reporting, marketing, and HRM. I received my Bachelor's in Mathematics and Philosophy from Yale. 

I am a tinkerer at heart and love to seek out new experiences. I feel most at home by the sea, so you'll often find me looking for new diving spots, fishing, or trying to catch some waves

founders.name: Motasim Zawawi, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder at Levers. Previously I was a Product Manager at Mozn, where I built a SaaS AML/KYC product for financial institutions from scratch and led product strategy, sales, and marketing. Before that, I received my Bachelors in Mechanical Engineering from Stanford University in 2018. 

I enjoy building delightful products and love the outdoors, especially scuba and free diving 🤿

# B2B receivables collection platform for modern finance teams
B2B finance teams use Levers to unlock trapped cash, eliminate grunt work, and streamline high volume receivables operations.
[Watch video](https://uselevers.com/<https:/youtu.be/osVwL0Do8R8>)

## Levers saves B2B businesses 1000+ hours spent in manual receivable tasks annually and reduces payment delays
## Levers saves B2B businesses 1000+ hours spent in manual receivable tasks annually and reduces payment delays
Products
## End-to-end receivables automation
### [Bank reconciliationAutomatically match and reconcile incoming bank transactions with outstanding invoicesGet started![Bank reconciliation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/667ae9406f6b68102b17ca9c_card-1.svg)](https://uselevers.com/</products/bank-reconciliation>)### [Automated follow upsScale your customer follow up communications and reduce grunt work.Get started![Automated follow ups](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/667ae9401b3777b191dca079_card-2.svg)](https://uselevers.com/</products/automated-collection>)
### [B2B PaymentsCollect payments online from your customers with ease.Explore![B2B Payments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/667ae96f39ca0da598014da2_card-3.svg)](https://uselevers.com/</products/b2b-payments>)### [InvoicingGenerate compliant recurring invoices directlyGet started![Invoicing](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/667ae940a483b2bd611cec01_card-4.svg)](https://uselevers.com/</products/automated-collection>)### [Connect to your finance tech stackConnect and sync with your existing accounting softwareGet started![Connect to your finance tech stack](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/668434a35a830a8a052d96bd_new%20logos.svg)](https://uselevers.com/</products/automated-collection>)
BENEFITS
## Supercharge your team and unlock trapped cash
Streamline your entire receivables process with automated dunning, escalation, payment collection, and reconciliation. Save time, reduce errors, and improve cash flow, allowing your team to focus on what matters most.
[Get Started](https://uselevers.com/</request-demo>)[Learn more](https://uselevers.com/</products/automated-collection>)
#### Improved cash flow
Accelerated payments by automating reminders and follow-ups.
#### Increased efficiency
Streamlined processes for managing invoices and payments.
#### Reduced DSO
Faster collections resulting in lower DSO.
#### Boost sales
Faster sales cycle and conversions.
#### Improved CX
Delight your customers with seamless collection and payments experience
#### Operational efficiency
Eliminate grunt work spent on follow ups and reconciliation
#### Risk management
Identification of delinquent accounts and better credit management
#### Accurate reconciliation
Faster and more accurate matching of payments to invoices.
WHY LEVERS
## How is Levers different from an ERP
Levers adds advanced collection capabilities on top of ERPs and CRMs, leading to 30-50% faster collection, improved cashflow, and higher team efficiency
[Get Started](https://uselevers.com/</request-demo>)[Learn more](https://uselevers.com/</about-us>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6675dd99b56a718f661feaad_01.svg)
Integrate with all your accounting, communication, and CRM tools in seconds.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6675dd9937b8f8578cfccccf_02.svg)
Collaborate with your team on all collection tasks with automated escalations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6675dd9a2a45a680d1dc89a4_03.svg)
Resolve disputes across all your invoices and customers fast
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6675dd98d2ec349bf3153be4_04.svg)
Accept multiple online payment methods with Levers payment gateway.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6675dd9942b2f4d5c89c6594_05.svg)
Segment your customers based on previous payments history and behavior across omni-channels.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6675dd99364d04eee2c4ff46_06.svg)
Personalized reminders across omni channels, such as Email, WhatsApp, SMS, and phone calls.
HEAR FROM OUR CUSTOMERS
## Used by forward thinking finance teams
![Global IT](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/66799021efda255d948363e3_03.png)
Global IT
"Prior to Levers, our invoices and customers data were scattered across our ERP, spreadsheets, and other tools. Levers enabled us to consolidate these into a unified database, cutting the time needed to generate receivables reports by 60%.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/667990ee847c8f2534c90ea9_image.png)
ISLAM A • FINANCE MANAGER
![Holouly](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6675a250a913692c6eb5a1f5_01.png)
Holouly
“Levers dramatically reduced time spent on back-and-forth communication with clients doing tasks like resharing invoices, contracts, and statements. By creating a dedicated portal for each customer, all documents and payment information are now instantly accessible”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6682ec626a6c95f1d0efc820_LAMIAA.png)
LAMIAA A • OPERATIONS EXPERT
![Index](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6675a25052aca86dcf65cbdb_02.png)
Index Lights
"Before implementing Levers, tracking outstanding invoices and communicating with customers was heavily manual and time-consuming. Levers increased our customers' response rate and helped us reduce payment delays”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/6682ec62e412726fe2ba6fcf_IBRAHIM.png)
IBRAHIM F • HEAD OF SALES
![AFAQY](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/66799021b6f5e87afed0f4ee_01.png)
Afaqy
"Levers streamlined our workflow by unifying our invoice, customer data, and documents, which were previously scattered across various platforms. This consolidation significantly reduced the time needed to generate receivables reports and reshare documents."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667582d0a4595ac186003a30/667990ee847c8f2534c90ea9_image.png)
ISLAM A • FINANCE MANAGER

## Levers saves B2B businesses 1000+ hours spent in manual receivable tasks annually and reduces payment delays

Products
## End-to-end receivables automation
### Bank reconciliationAutomatically match and reconcile incoming bank transactions with outstanding invoicesGet started![Bank reconciliation⟨22⟩](https://uselevers.com/</products/bank-reconciliation>)### Automated follow upsScale your customer follow up communications and reduce grunt work.Get started![Automated follow ups⟨23⟩](https://uselevers.com/</products/automated-collection>)
### B2B PaymentsCollect payments online from your customers with ease.Explore![B2B Payments⟨24⟩](https://uselevers.com/</products/b2b-payments>)### InvoicingGenerate compliant recurring invoices directlyGet started![Invoicing⟨25⟩](https://uselevers.com/</products/automated-collection>)### Connect to your finance tech stackConnect and sync with your existing accounting softwareGet started![Connect to your finance tech stack⟨26⟩](https://uselevers.com/</products/automated-collection>)
BENEFITS
## Supercharge your team and unlock trapped cash
Streamline your entire receivables process with automated dunning, escalation, payment collection, and reconciliation. Save time, reduce errors, and improve cash flow, allowing your team to focus on what matters most.
Get Started⟨3⟩Learn more⟨4⟩
#### Improved cash flow
Accelerated payments by automating reminders and follow-ups.
#### Increased efficiency
Streamlined processes for managing invoices and payments.
#### Reduced DSO
Faster collections resulting in lower DSO.
#### Boost sales
Faster sales cycle and conversions.
#### Improved CX
Delight your customers with seamless collection and payments experience
#### Operational efficiency
Eliminate grunt work spent on follow ups and reconciliation
#### Risk management
Identification of delinquent accounts and better credit management
#### Accurate reconciliation
Faster and more accurate matching of payments to invoices.
WHY LEVERS
## How is Levers different from an ERP
Levers adds advanced collection capabilities on top of ERPs and CRMs, leading to 30-50% faster collection, improved cashflow, and higher team efficiency
Get Started⟨3⟩Learn more⟨16⟩

generated_description:
Levers is a dynamic startup based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, focusing on automating collections and boosting cash flow for B2B companies. Founded in 2022 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Levers offers a robust accounts receivable management SaaS that helps businesses streamline their financial operations by effectively managing overdue payments, accelerating cash collections, and improving overall cash flow.

### What Makes Levers Tick

At its core, Levers lives by the mission to simplify and enhance the accounts receivable process. It does this by integrating seamlessly with existing accounting systems, providing features like personalized reminders, cross-team collaboration tools, and collection performance analytics. This means that finance teams can finally say goodbye to manual tracking of invoices and the headache of follow-ups, all while gaining insight into their collection processes.

### Key Offerings

Levers operates a platform with several prominent features:
- **Automated Collection:** Scale customer communications and minimize manual follow-ups.
- **Bank Reconciliation:** Quickly match bank transactions with outstanding invoices.
- **B2B Payments:** Simplify the collection of online payments.
- **Invoicing:** Automatically generate compliant recurring invoices.

These capabilities help businesses save over a thousand hours annually on manual tasks, significantly reducing payment delays and freeing up teams to focus on core business activities.

### Benefits of Using Levers

By adopting Levers, businesses can experience:
- Accelerated cash flow through automated reminders.
- Increased operational efficiency and reduced Days Sales Outstanding (DSO).
- Improvement in customer experience with seamless payment processes.

### The Levers Advantage

What sets Levers apart from traditional ERPs is its unique focus on enhancing collections. It adds advanced functionalities that lead to quicker payment collections and improved cash flow, offering a practical solution for finance teams that need to manage high volumes of receivables efficiently.

Levers currently has a dedicated team of eight and has garnered favorable insights from clients who appreciate its streamlined processes and enhanced operational clarity. The company stands out in the SaaS and finance sectors, making waves in the automation of collections for modern finance teams.

To learn more and get started, visit [Levers](https://uselevers.com/).
